GK16andhvc4u:545_1: dhvaneradhvanā kavīnāṃ pratibhāguṇo 'nanto bhavatotyeṣa bhāgo vyākhyāta ityupasaṃharati--tadevamityādinā
GK16andhvc4u:546: triprabhedo vastvalaṅkārarasātmanā yo vyaṅgyaḥ tasya yāpekṣā vācyeguṇībhāvaḥ tayetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc4u:547: tatra sarve ye dhvanibhedāsteṣāṃ guṇībhāvādānantyamiti tadāha--ativistareti /
GK16andhvc4u:549: tatra vastunā vyaṅgyena guṇībhūtena navatvaṃ satyapa purāṇārthasparśe yathā mamaiva-- bhaavihalarakhkhaṇekakamallasaraṇāgaāṇaaththāṇa
GK16andhvc4u:551: atra tvamanavaratamarthāstyajasīti audāryalakṣaṇaṃ vastu dhvanyamānaṃ vācyasyopaskārakaṃ bālapriyā tribhedavyaṅgyāpekṣayetyetadvyācaṣṭe--triprabheda ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:561: alaṅkāreṇa vyaṅgyena vācyopaskāre navatvaṃ yathā mamaiva--
GK16andhvc4u:564: atra hyākṣepeṇa vibhāvanayā ca dhvanyamānābhyāṃ vācyamupaskṛtamiti navatvaṃ satyapi purāṇārthayogitve
GK16andhvc4u:568: vyaṅgyena rasena guṇībhūtena vācyopaskāreṇa navatvaṃ yathā mameva-- jarā neyaṃ mūrdhni dhruvamayamasau kālabhujagaḥ krudhāndhaḥ phūtkāraiḥ sphuṭagaralaphenān prakirati // //
GK16andhvc4u:569: tadenaṃ saṃpaśyatyatha ca sukhitammanyahṛdayaḥ śivo pāyannecchan bata bata sudhīraḥ khalu janaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:576: vasante vasantena vā mattā ye alayo bhṛṅgāstatparamparopamāḥ teṣāṃ paramparayā tulyāḥ atinīlasnigdhā iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc4u:579: śmaśānabhūbhāge ye parāgāḥ bhasmareṇavaste iva bhāsurāḥ śubhrāḥ jarayā śuklā iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc4u:582: tava manāgīṣadupi viraktaye vairāgyāya na bhavanti /
GK16andhvc4u:583: tat tathaṃ vairāgyasya kāraṇe satyapi tadajananaṃ kuta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:584: anena pratyuta kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāma eva vardhanta ityarthasya kāmasya mahimā varṇayitumaśakya ityarthasya ca prakāśanādvibhāvanākṣepau vyajyete,
GK16andhvc4u:589: mūrdhni iyaṃ dṛśyamānā jarā na bhavati /
GK16andhvc4u:593: phūtkāraiḥ sphuṭaṃ garalaṃ yeṣu tathābhūtān phenān prakirati varṣati /
GK16andhvc4u:594: iyaṃ na jarā, kintu śirasthakālabhujagābhivṛṣṭaḥ phenanikara
GK16andhvc4u:596: na kāvyārtha-virāmo 'sti yadi syāt pratibhā-guṇaḥ // DhvK_4.6 //
GK16andhvc4u:599: satsvapi purātanakaviprabandheṣu yadi syātpratibhāguṇaḥ, tasmiṃstvasati na kiñcideva kavervastvasti
GK16andhvc4u:603_1: vācyamupaskṛtaṃ śāntarasapratipatyaṅgatvāccāru bhavatīti navatvaṃ satyapyasmin purāṇaśloke
GK16andhvc4u:603_2: jarājīrṇaśarīrasya vairāgyaṃ yanna jāyate, tannunaṃ hṛdaye mṛtyurdṛḍhannāstīti niścayaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:605: trīn pādān spaṣṭānmatvā turyaṃ pādaṃ vyākhyātuṃ paṭhati--yadīti /
GK16andhvc4u:606: vidyamāno hyasau pratibhāgaṇa uktarītyā bhūyān bhavati, na tvatyantāsannevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:610: sarva hi purāṇakavinaiva spṛṣṭamiti kimidānīṃ varṇyaṃ, yatra kavervarṇanāvyāpārassyāt /
GK16andhvc4u:623: sampaśyati atha ca sukhitamanyahṛdayaḥ śivopāyaṃ necchaṃśca /
GK16andhvc4u:635: itīdaṃ sahṛdayānāṃ na nedīya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:648: śabdārthayoḥ sāhityena kāvyatve kathaṃ tathāvidhe viṣaye kāvyavyavastheti
GK16andhvc4u:653: ānantyam eva vācyasya śuddhasyāpi svabhāvataḥ // DhvK_4.7 //
GK16andhvc4u:657: svabhāvo hyayaṃ vācyānāṃ cetanānāmacetanānāṃ ca yadavasthābhedāddeśabhedātkālabhedātsvālakṣaṇyabhedāccānantatā bhavati /
GK16andhvc4u:658: taiśca tathāvyavasthitaiḥ sadbhiḥ prasiddhānekasvabhāvānusaraṇarūpayā svabhāvoktyāpi tāvadupanibadhyamānairniravadhiḥ locanam caturatvaṃ samāsasaṅghaṭanā /
GK16andhvc4u:662: kavanīyaṃ kāvyaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ kāvyatvaṃ, na tvayaṃ bhāvapratyayāntāt
GK16andhvc4u:666: yadi vā vācyantābadvividhavyaṅgyopayogi tadeva cedanantaṃ tadbalādeva vyaṅgyānantyaṃ bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇedaṃ prakṛtamevocyate /
GK16andhvc4u:668: vyaṅgyaviṣayo yo vyāpāraḥ tatsparśaṃ vināpyānantyaṃ svarūpamātreṇaiva paścāttu tathā svarūpeṇānantaṃ sadvyaṅgyaṃ vyanaktīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:669: na tu sarvathā tatra vyaṅgyaṃ nāstīti mantavyamātmabhūtatadrūpābhāve
GK16andhvc4u:693: saiva ca punarnavodvāhasamaye prasādhyamānā 'tāṃ prāṅmukhīṃ tatra niveśya
GK16andhvc4u:695: na ca te tasya kaverekatraivāsakṛtkṛtā varṇanaprakārā apunaruktatvena vā navanavārthanirbharatvena vā pratibhāsante /
GK16andhvc4u:696: darśitameva caitadviṣamabāṇalīlāyām--- ṇa a tāṇa ghaḍai ohī ṇa a te dīsanti kaha vi punaruttā
GK16andhvc4u:697: je vibbhamā piāṇaṃ atthā vā sukaivāṇīṇam // //
GK16andhvc4u:698: ayamaparaścāvasthābhedaprakāro yadacetanānāṃ sarveṣāṃ cetanaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpamabhimānitvaprasiddhaṃ himavadgaṅgādīnām /
GK16andhvc4u:700: yathā kumārasambhava eva parvatasvarūpasya himavato varṇanaṃ, punaḥ saptarṣipriyoktiṣu cetanatassvarūpāpekṣayā pradarśitaṃ tadapūrvameva pratibhāti /
GK16andhvc4u:702: idaṃ locanam na ca teṣāṃ ghaṭate 'vadhiḥ, na ca te dṛśyante kathamapi punaruktāḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:706: prayatnenāpi vicāryamāṇaṃ paunaruktyaṃ na labhyamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc4u:708: bahuvallabho hi subhago rādhāvallabhaprāyastāstāḥ kāminīḥ paribhogasubhagamupabhuñjāno 'pi na vibhramapaunaruktyaṃ paśyati tadā /
GK16andhvc4u:709: etadeva priyātvamucyate, yadāha-- bālapriyā prathamasarga ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:714: te varṇanaprakārāḥ na ca bhāsanta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:718: priyāṇāṃ vibhramāḥ kathamapi punaruktā na dṛśyanta
GK16andhvc4u:723: ca prasthānaṃ kavivyutpattaye viṣamabāṇalīlāyāṃ saprapañcaṃ darśitam /
GK16andhvc4u:729: yathā--- haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu yaiḥ kavalitairāsajyate kūjatā- manyaḥ ko 'pi
GK16andhvc4u:731: te sampratyakaṭhoravāraṇavaghūdantāṅkuraspardhino niryātāḥ kamalākareṣu bisinīkandāgrimagranthayaḥ evamanyatrāpi diśānayānusartavyam /
GK16andhvc4u:732: locanam kṣaṇe kṣaṇe yannavatāmupaiti tadeva rūpaṃ ramaṇīyatāyā iti /
GK16andhvc4u:733: priyāṇāmiti cāsaṃsāraṃ pravahadrūparo yo 'yaṃ kāntānāṃ vibhramaviśeṣaḥ sa
GK16andhvc4u:738: bālapriyā priyāṇāṃ vibhramā ityanena gamyamarthamāha---priyāṇāmiti cetyādi
GK16andhvc4u:761: yaiḥ kūjatāṃ haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu kaṣāyakaṇṭhaluṇṭhanādāghargharaḥ anyaḥ ko
GK16andhvc4u:763: tacca yathāvasthitamapi tāvadupanibadhyamānamityatra tāvatpadaṃ locane vivṛṇoti--uttarakālantvityādi
GK16andhvc4u:766: cetanānāmapi mānuṣapaśupakṣiprabhṛtīnāṃ grāmāraṇyasalilādisamedhitānāṃ parasparaṃ mahānviśeṣaḥ samupalakṣyata eva /
GK16andhvc4u:769: vicitrā viśeṣāsteṣāṃ kenāntaḥ śakyate gantum, viśeṣato yoṣitām /
GK16andhvc4u:776: atra kecidācakṣarin---yathā sābhānyātmanā vastūni vācyatāṃ pratipadyante na viśeṣātmanā; tāni hi svayamanubhūtānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ tannimittānāṃ ca
GK16andhvc4u:778: na hi tairatītamanāgataṃ vartamānañca aparicitādisvalakṣaṇaṃ yogibhiriva
GK16andhvc4u:779: pratyakṣīkrīyate; taccānubhāvyānubhavasāmānyaṃ sarvapratipattṛsādhāraṇaṃ parimitatvātpurātanānāmeva gocarībhūtam, tasyā viṣayatvānupapatteḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:781: uttarakālantu vyaṅgyasparśanena vicitratāṃ parāṃ bhajatānnāma, tāvati tu svabhāvenaiva sā vicitreti tāvacchabdasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:796: ata eva sa prakāraviśeṣo yairadyatanairabhinavatvena pratīyate teṣāmabhimāna mātrameva bhaṇitakṛtaṃ vaicitryamātramatrāstīti /
GK16andhvc4u:798: parimitatvena prāgeva gocarīkṛtatvānnāsti navatvaṃ kāvyapravṛttistasya ca parimitatvena prāgeva gocarīkṛtatvānnāsti navatvaṃ kāvyavastūnāmiti,
GK16andhvc4u:799: tadayuktam; yato yadi sāmānyamātramāśritya kāvyaṃ pravartate kiṅkṛtastarhi
GK16andhvc4u:801: vālmikivyatiriktasyānyasya kavivyapadeśa eva vā sāmānyavyatiriktasyānyasya kāvyārthasyabhāvāt, sāmānyasya cādikavinaiva pradarśitatvāt /
GK16andhvc4u:802: uktivaicitryānnaiṣa doṣa iti cet--kimidumuktivaicitryam? uktirhi vācyaviśeṣapratipādi vacanam
GK16andhvc4u:805: locanam pratyakṣadarśane 'pi hi--- śabdāssaṃketitaṃ prāhurvyavahārāya sa
GK16andhvc4u:807: tadā svalakṣaṇaṃ nāsti saṅketastena tatra naḥ // //
GK16andhvc4u:813: paryāyamātrataiva yadyuktiviśeṣastatparyāyāntarairavikalaṃ tadarthopanibandhe apaunaruktyābhimāno na bhavati /
GK16andhvc4u:819: anubhāvyānāmanubhavitavyānāṃ vastūnāmanubhavānāṃ ca yat sāmānyaṃ sāmānyasvarūpamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc4u:829: kvacidganthe tvasmāt pūrvaṃ 'yadi sāmānyamātrāśrayeṇa kāvyapravṛttistatprarśitaprakāraṃ kāvyavaicitryamavasthādiviśeṣātkiṃ
GK16andhvc4u:830: punaruktamevāstu na cettathā tatkarthaṃ na kāvyānantyam' ityapi pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:837: vācyānāṃ ca kāvye pratibhāsamānānāṃ yadrūpaṃ tattu grāhyaviśeṣābhedenaiva pratīyate /
GK16andhvc4u:843: yato yāvānayaṃ kāvyārthānantyabhedahetuḥ prakāraḥ prāgdarśitaḥ sa sarva eva punaruktivaicitryāddviguṇatāmāpadyate
GK16andhvc4u:846: grāhyaḥ pratyakṣādipramāṇairyo viśeṣaḥ tasya yo abhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:847: tenāyamarthaḥ--padānāntāvatsāmānye vā tadvati vāpohe vā yatra kutrāpi
GK16andhvc4u:848: vastuni samayaḥ, kimanena vādāntareṇa? vākyāttadviśeṣaḥ pratīyata iti
GK16andhvc4u:854: bhūya ityartha-. upamā hi nibha, pratim cchala, pratibimba, praticchāya,
GK16andhvc4u:857: niyamena bhānayogāddhi nibhaśabdaḥ, bālapriyā kintu paunaruktyabuddhireva
GK16andhvc4u:864: mīmāṃsakādīnāṃ mate sāmānye vastuni, naiyāyikamate tadvati, bauddhamate apohe samayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:876: nanu nibhapratimādiśabdānāṃ samānārthakatvāt kathaṃ ta citryamityata
GK16andhvc4u:880: ralaṅkāravargaḥ prasiddha sa bhaṇitivaicitryādupanibadhyamānaḥ svayamevānavadhirdhatte punaḥ śataśākhatām /
GK16andhvc4u:881: bhaṇitiśca svabhāṣābhedena vyavasthitā satī pratiniyatabhāṣāgocarārthavaicitryanibandhanaṃ punaraparaṃ kāvyārthānāmānantyamāpādayati /
GK16andhvc4u:882: yathā mamaiva--- mahamaha itti bhaṇantau vajjadi kālo jaṇassa /
GK16andhvc4u:883: toi ṇa deu jaṇaddaṇa goarī bhodi maṇaso // //
GK16andhvc4u:884: itthaṃ yathā yathā nirūpyate tathā tathā na labhyate 'ntaḥ kāvyārthānām /
GK16andhvc4u:886: yatpradarśitaṃ prāk locanam tadanukāratayā tu pratimaśabda ityevaṃ sarvatra vācyaṃ kevalaṃ bālopayogi kāvyaṭīkāpariśīlanadaurātmyādeṣu paryāyatvabhrama iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:889: pratiniyatāyā bhāṣāyā gocaro vācyoyo 'rthastatkṛtaṃ yadvaicitryaṃ tannibandhanaṃ nimittaṃ yasya, alaṅkārāṇāṃ kāvyārthānāñcānantyasya /
GK16andhvc4u:892: mama mama iti bhaṇato vrajati kālo heturdarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:893: tathāpi na devo janārdano gocaro bhavati manasaḥ // //
GK16andhvc4u:894: madhumathana iti yo anavarataṃ bhaṇati, tasya kathanna devo manogocaro bhavatīti vīrodhālaṅkāracchāyā
GK16andhvc4u:904: mama mama iti bhaṇataḥ mamāyaṃ mamedamityādi bhaṇataḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:909: mahamaha ityasya mama mama iti madhumathana iti ca chāyā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ // 7 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:910: ita ūrdhvaṅkārikāvṛtyorbhedasya durgrahatayā tadubhayaṃ pṛthakpradarśayan vivṛṇoti--avasthetyādi
GK16andhvc4u:923: nibaddhā sā kṣayaṃ naiti prakṛtir jagatām iva // DhvK_4.10 //
GK16andhvc4u:926: yathāhi jagatprakṛtiratītakalpaparamparāvirbhūtavicitravastuprapañcā satī locanam bhūmnaiva dṛśyate lakṣye tattu bhāti rasāśrayāt // //
GK16andhvc4u:934: 'yatpradarśitaṃ prāgi'ti 'na tacchakyamapohitum' iti ca grantha ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc4u:954: atītānāṃ kalpanāṃ paramparāyāmāvirbhūntaḥ āvirbhāvitaḥ vicitrāṇāṃ vastūnāṃ prapañco yayā sā 'parī'ti /
GK16andhvc4u:960: saṃvādās tu bhavanty eva bāhulyena sumedhasām /
GK16andhvc4u:961: sthitaṃ hy etat saṃvādinya eva medhāvināṃ buddhayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:963: naika-rūpatayā sarve te mantavyā vipaścitā // DhvK_4.11 //
GK16andhvc4u:965: sthitaṃ hyetat saṃvādinya eva medhāvināṃ buddhayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:966: kintu-- naikarūpatayā sarve te mantavyā vipaścitā // 11 //
GK16andhvc4u:967: kathamiti cet--- saṃvādo hyanyasādṛśyaṃ tatpunaḥ pratibimbavat /
GK16andhvc4u:969: saṃvādo hi kāvyārthasyocyate yadanyena kāvyavastunā sādṛśyam /
GK16andhvc4u:971: kiñciddhi kāvyavastu vastvantarasya śarīriṇaḥ pratibimbakalpam, locanam saṃvādā iti kāri kāyā ardhaṃ, naikarūpatayeti dvitīyam // 11 //
GK16andhvc4u:974: saṃvādo hy anya-sādṛśyaṃ tat punaḥ pratibimbavat /
GK16andhvc4u:985: atra sumedhasāṃ saṃvādā ityasya sumedhasāṃ buddhīnāṃ kāvyānāṃ ca saṃvādā ityartha ityabhipretya 'sthitaṃ hyetadi'tyādikaṃ 'saṃvādo hi
GK16andhvc4u:989: ata eva vakṣyate--keṣucit pustakeṣu kārikā akhaṇḍīkṛtā eva dṛśyanta iti /
GK16andhvc4u:991: kāvyārthasyocyate, yadanyena kāvyavastunā sādṛśyam, tat punaḥ pratibimbavat, tatpunaśśarīriṇāṃ pratibimbavat' ityādikaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc4u:996: tṛtīyaṃ tu prasiddhātma nānya-sāmyaṃ tyajet kaviḥ // DhvK_4.13 //
GK16andhvc4u:999: tatra pūrvaṃ pratibimbakalpaṃ kāvyavastu parihartavyaṃ sumatinā /
GK16andhvc4u:1002: tṛtīyaṃ tu vibhinnakamanīyaśarīrasadbhāve sati sasaṃvādamapi kāvyavastu na tyaktavyaṃ kavinā
GK16andhvc4u:1003: na hi śarīrī śarīriṇānyena sadṛśo 'pyeka eveti śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc4u:1008: ananyaḥ pūrvopanibandhakāvyādātmā svabhāvo yasya tadananyātma yena rūpeṇa bhāti tatprākkavispṛṣṭameva, yathā yena rūpeṇa pratibimbaṃ bhāti, tena rūpeṇa bimbamevaitat /
GK16andhvc4u:1011: evaṃ prathamaṃ prakāraṃ vyākhyāya dvitīyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--tadanantarantviti /
GK16andhvc4u:1015: anukāre hyanukāryabuddhireva citrapustādāviva na tu sindūrādibuddhiḥ
GK16andhvc4u:1016: sphurati, sāpi ca na cārugatvāyeti bhāvaḥ //13//
GK16andhvc4u:1020: pratibimbe anyasādṛśyaṃ śarīriṇā bimbena sādṛśyamevamālekhyākāratulyadehanośca śarīriṇā sādṛśyaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc4u:1023: nānyasāmyaṃ tyajetkavirityuktyā gamyasyārthasya vivaraṇaṃ vṛttau 'parihartavyaṃ sumatine'ti
GK16andhvc4u:1025: tātvikaśarīraśūnyamityananyātmetyasya vivaraṇamityanyathā pratipattiḥ syādityato locane vivṛṇota--ananya ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1041: vastu bhātitarāṃ tanvyāḥ śaśi-cchāyam ivānanam // DhvK_4.14 //
GK16andhvc4u:1044: tattvasya sārabhūtasyātmanaḥ saddhāve 'nyasya pūrvasthityanuyāyyapi vastu bhātitarām /
GK16andhvc4u:1045: purāṇaramaṇīyacchāyānugṛhītaṃ hi vastu śarīravatparāṃ śobhāṃ puṣyati /
GK16andhvc4u:1048: evaṃ tāvatsasaṃvādānāṃ samudāyarūpāṇāṃ vākyārthānāṃ vibhaktāḥ sīmānaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1049: padārtharūpāṇāṃ ca vastvantarasadṛśānāṃ kāvyavastūnāṃ nāstyeva doṣa iti
GK16andhvc4u:1052: nūtane sphurati kāvya-vastuni vyaktam eva khalu sā na duṣyati // DhvK_4.15
GK16andhvc4u:1054: nūtane sphurati kāvyavastuni vyaktameva khalu sāna duṣyati // 15 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:1055: na hi vācyaspatināpyakṣarāṇi padāni vā kānicidapūrvāṇi ghaṭayituṃ locanam etadeveti tṛtīyasya rūpasyātyājyatvam /
GK16andhvc4u:1060: ātmana ityasya śabdasya pūrvapaṭhitābhyāmeva tatvasya sārabhūtasyeti ca padābhyāmartho nirūpitaḥ sasaṃvādānāmiti pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1061: saṃvādānāmiti tu pāṭhe vākyārtharūpāṇāṃ samudāyānāṃ ye saṃvādāḥ teṣāmiti vaiyadhikaraṇyena saṃgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1062: vastuśabtadena eko vā dvau vā trayo bālapriyā
GK16andhvc4u:1064: ātmana ityasyārtho nirūpita iti sambandhaḥ tattvasya sārabhūtasyeti cātmapadārthavivaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1069: purāṇī ramaṇīyā ca yā chāyā tayānugṛhītamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1073: tāni tu tānyevopanibaddhāni na kāvyādiṣu navatāṃ virudhyanti /
GK16andhvc4u:1075: tasmāt-- yadapi tadapi ramyaṃ yatra lokasya kiñcit-sphuritamidamitīyaṃ
GK16andhvc4u:1078: anugatam api pūrva-cchāyayā vastu tādṛk sukavir upanibadhnan nindyatāṃ nopayāti // DhvK_4.16
GK16andhvc4u:1090: sadvṛttatejasviguṇadvijādayo hi śabdāḥ pūrvapūrvairapi kavisahasraiḥ śleṣacchāyayā nibadhyante, nibaddhāścandrādayaścopamānatvena /
GK16andhvc4u:1091: tathaiva padārtharūpāṇītyatra nāpūrvāṇi ghaṭayituṃ śakyante ityādi virudhyantītyevamantaṃ prāktanaṃ vākyamabhisandhānīyam // 15 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:1098: yadapi tadapi ramyaṃ yatra lokasya kiñci- tsphuritamidamitīyaṃ buddhirabhyujjihīte /
GK16andhvc4u:1112: yatretyasya sthāne yā tviti vā pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1118: idaṃ kiñcit sphuritamitīyaṃ buddhiḥ lokasya ujjihīte ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1119: tadanugatamapi pūrvacchāyayā vastu tādṛk tādṛkṣaṃ sukavirvivakṣitavyaṅgyavācyārthasamarpaṇasamarthaśabdaracanārūpayā bandhacchāyayopanibadhnannindhatāṃ naiva yāti /
GK16andhvc4u:1120: taditthaṃ sthitam--- pratāyantāṃ vāco nimitavividhārthāmṛtarasā na sādaḥ kartavyaḥ kavibhiranavadye svaviṣaye /
GK16andhvc4u:1121: santi navāḥ kāvyārthāḥ paropanibaddhārthaviracane na kaścitkaverguṇa iti bhāvayitvā /
GK16andhvc4u:1122: parasvādānecchā-virata-manaso vastu sukaveḥ sarasvaty evaiṣā ghaṭayati yatheṣṭaṃ bhagavatī parasvādānecchāviratamanaso vastu sukaveḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1124: locanam anugatamipi pūrvacchāyayā vastu tādṛksukavirupanibadhnannindyatāṃ nopayati // //
GK16andhvc4u:1129: paṭhati--parasvādānecchāviratamanaso bālapriyā tatra lokasyetyādervivaraṇaṃ vṛttau 'sphuraṇeyam' ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1137: nimitāḥ tulitāḥ vividhārthāmṛtarasāḥ amṛtarasatulyāḥ vividhārthāḥ yābhiḥ
GK16andhvc4u:1143: 'svaviṣaye' kāvyavastuni viṣaye kavibhiḥ 'sādaḥ' manassādaḥ, kutaḥ khalvapūrvamānayamītyādicintayā viṣāda iti yāvat; na kartavyaḥ, kuta
GK16andhvc4u:1147: 'yatheṣṭaṃ' kaveriṣṭamanatikramya iti kārikārthaṃ spaṣṭaṃ matvā svaviṣaya
GK16andhvc4u:1152: karikāpūrvārdhapāṭhānantaraṃ santī parasvādānecchāviratamanasaḥ sukaveḥ sarasvatyeṣā bhagavatī yatheṣṛṃ ghaṭayati vastu /
GK16andhvc4u:1153: yeṣāṃ sukavīnāṃ prāktanapuṇyābhyāsaparipākavaśena pravṛttisteṣāṃ paroparacatārthaparigrahaniḥspṛhāṇāṃ svavyāpāro na kvacidupayujyate /
GK16andhvc4u:1158: kutaḥ khalvapūrvamānayāmītyāśayena nirudyogaḥ paropanibaddhavastūpajīvako vā syādatyāśaṅkyāha--sarasvatyeveti
GK16andhvc4u:1166: akliṣṭā rasāśrayeṇa ucitā ye guṇālaṅkārāstato yā śobhā tāṃ bibharti kāvyam
GK16andhvc4u:1167: udyānamapyakliṣṭaḥ kālocito yo lasaḥ sekādikṛtaḥ tadāśrayastatkṛto yo guṇānāṃ saukumāryacchāyāvatvasaugandhyaprabhṛtīnamalaṅkāraḥ paryāptatākāraṇaṃ tena ca yā śobhā tāṃ bibharti /
GK16andhvc4u:1172: tasya parasvādānecchāviratamanasa ityatra viratetyanena sambandhaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1179: kārikā ca tadvṛttiśca tābhyāṃ yannirūpaṇaṃ tatprakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1181: akliṣṭeti śobhāyāḥ rasāśrayociteti guṇālaṅkārayośca viśeṣaṇamiti darśayan
GK16andhvc4u:1194: locanam etacca sarvaṃ pūrvameva vitatyoktamiti ślokārthamātraṃ vyākhyātam
GK16andhvc4u:1196: ye kaṣṭopadeśenāpi vinā tathāvi dhaphalabhājaḥ tairityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1198: akhilaṃ duḥkhaleśenāpyananuviddhaṃ yatsaukhyaṃ tasya dhāmni ekāyatana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1199: sarvathā priyaṃ sarvathā ca hitaṃ durlabhaṃ jagatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1204: sthita eva san prakāśitaḥ, aprakāśitasya hi kathaṃ bhogyatvam /
GK16andhvc4u:1205: kalpataruṇā upamānaṃ yasya tādṛṅmahimā yasyeti bahuvrīhigarbho bahuvrīhiḥ
GK16andhvc4u:1210: tathāvidhāni vyutpatyādīni phalāni bhajante tadbhajanaśīlāḥ tadarhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1214: nāsti khilaṃ yasmiṃstadakhilaṃ iti bahuvrīhiścetyāśayena vivṛṇoti--duḥkhetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1225: atra kalpatarusāmyasya mahimni śabdena bodhane 'pi mahimāśraye dhvanau tasya paryavasānaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc4u:1226: kāvyaṃ nandanodyānena tulyaṃ dhvaniḥ kalpatarutulyaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1236: dhvanisvarūpaṃ tatsā tadyvākarotsahṛdayodayalābhaheto- rānandavardhana iti prathitābhidhānaḥ
GK16andhvc4u:1237: iti śrīrājānakānandavardhanācāryaviracite dhvanyāloke caturtha uddyotaḥ samāpto 'yaṃ granthaḥ
GK16andhvc4u:1239: iha bāhulyena loko lokaprasiṣyā sambhāvanāpratyayabalena pravartate /
GK16andhvc4u:1242: evaṃvidhassāro dṛśyate tasyāyaṃ ślokaprabandhastasmādādaraṇīyametadita lokaḥ pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc4u:1245: prathitaśabdenaitadeva prathitaṃ yattu bālapriyā dhakaṃ yuktajātaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1248: sahṛdayānāṃ ya udaya abhyudayaḥ dhvanisvarūpāvabodhahetukā prītiḥ tallābhasya hetoḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1252: ślokārthaṃ spaṣṭaṃ matvā vaktavyamaṃśaṃ vivṛṇoti locane---satkāvyetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1267: sa ca sambhāvanā pratyayo bhavatīti sambandha- /
GK16andhvc4u:1276: tanmātsaryavijṛmbhitaṃ nātra gaṇanīyam, niśreyasaprayojanādeva hi śrutātko
GK16andhvc4u:1277: 'pi rāgāndho yadi nivartate kimetāvatā prayojanamaprayojanamapyavaśyaṃ vaktavyameva syāt
GK16andhvc4u:1288: yadeva nāmaśravaṇaṃ bahūnāṃ pravṛttiṃ karoti, tadeva nāmaśravaṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1302: prathamodyotānte parāyā dvitīyodyotānte paśyantyāstṛtīyodyotānte madhyamāyāśca vandanaṃ kṛtavān granthakāraḥ, caturthodyotānte vaikharyā vandanamanutiṣṭhati--sphuṭītyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1303: sphuṭīkṛtāni vaktrā manasi spaṣṭīkṛtāni yāni arthavaicitryāṇi vicitrārthāḥ teṣāṃ yaḥbahiḥprasaraḥ śrotṛjaneṣu prakāśaḥ taddāyinīm /
GK16andhvc4u:1310: ānandavardhanasya yo vivekaḥ vivicyatattadarthāvabodhaḥ tena vikāsī prakāśamāno yaḥ kāvyalokastasya yānyarthatatvāni sārārthāḥ teṣāṃ ghaṭanātsaṃyojanāddhetoḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1311: anumeyassāra utkarṣo yasya tat, kiñca yat pronmiṣat sahṛdayeṣu prakāśamānamatha ca prakarṣeṇa unmiṣat sat sakalānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ
GK16andhvc4u:1312_0: kāvyādīnāṃ sadviṣayān sārārthān sakalān sadviṣayānvā atha ca sakalānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāvyādīnāṃ
GK16andhvc4u:1312_1: sadbiṣayān sārārthān sakalān sadviṣayān vā atha ca sakalān sadviṣayān vidyamānān
GK16andhvc4u:1312_2: padārthān prakāśayatīti tathā bhavati tat tathāvidham /
GK16andhvc4u:1313: abhinavaguptasya tannāmnaḥ svasya, atha ca abhinavaṃ navīnāṃ guptamanyeṣāmaviditaṃ ca locanamālocanaṃ jñānaṃ netraṃ ca vyāpāryata ātmanā vyāpāritam /
GK16andhvc4u:1317: śrīmataḥ siddhicelasya tannāmnaḥ guroḥ caraṇābjaparāgaiḥ pūto yo locanam śrīsiddhicelacaraṇābjaparāgapūtabhaṭṭendurājamatisaṃskṛtabuddhileśaḥ
GK16andhvc4u:1319: sajjanān kavirasau na yācate hlādanāya śaśamṛtkimarthitaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1320: naiva nindati khalānmuhurmuhuḥ dhikkṛto 'pi na hi śītalo 'nalaḥ // //
GK16andhvc4u:1322: nāśivaṃ kvacana kasyacidvacaḥ tena vaśśivamayī daśā bhavet //
GK16andhvc4u:1323: iti mahāmāheśvarābhinavaguptaviracite kāvyālokalocane caturtha udyotaḥ samāptaścāvaṃ granthaḥ
GK16andhvc4u:1324: bālapriyā bhaṭṭendurājaḥ tasya matyā jñānena saṃskṛto buddhileśo yasya saḥ
GK16andhvc4u:1326: vākyaṃ mīmāṃsāśāstraṃ, pramāṇaṃ nyāyaśāstraṃ, padaṃ vyākaraṇaśāstraṃ,
GK16andhvc4u:1335: kuto na yācata ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntapradarśanena parihariti---śaśabhṛtkimarthita iti /
GK16andhvc4u:1339: candra iva sajjanaḥ svayameva parānāhlādayatīti candrasyeva parāhlādanaṃ sajjanasya svabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1343: khalānnaiva nindati kuta ityata āha---na hītyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1345: na hi yathā agniḥ sarvadā uṣṇasvabhāva eva tathā khalajanaḥ paradūṣaṇasvabhāva eva, svabhāvaścāparihārya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1347: atha paramamāheśvaro granthakāro granthānte paramaśivānusandhānātmakaṃ paramamaṅgalamanutiṣṭhannāha---vastuta ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1348: janasya hṛdi hṛdaye vastutaḥ śivamaye sati śivamaye hṛdīti vā yojanā,
GK16andhvc4u:1349: sarvataḥ sarvaṃ vastu sphuṭaṃ śivamayaṃ virājate bhāti /
GK16andhvc4u:1351: kvacana kvacidapi kasyacidvacaḥ aśivaṃ na bhavati, kintu sarvatra śivameva
GK16andhvc4u:1353: anena vastutaḥ śivamaye svasya hṛdaye sarvaṃ śivamayaṃ bhāti /
GK16andhvc4u:1358: śivamayī maṅgalamayī daśā bhavet bhavatviti sarvaṃ śivam /
GK16andhvc4u:1369: prauḍhaṃ kva locanaṃ kvāhaṃ mandadhīrbahudhātra tat /
GK16andhvc4u:1371: iti śrīsahṛdayatilaka paṇḍitarāja birudadvayaśālinā rāmanāmnā śārakeṇa viracitāyāṃ kāvyālokalocanaṭippaṇyāṃ bālapriyākhyāyāṃ caturtha udyotaḥ samāpto 'yaṃ granthaḥ //
